thread.title: RODRIGUEZ, SANDEE

author: RODRIGUEZ, SANDEE
title: RODRIGUEZ, SANDEE
text: I have NEVER had a problem in the more than decade I have ordered and dealt with this company with products and machine issues. They have excellent customer service and have been very prompt with responses back to me. I will continue to do business with them in big amounts and recommend them to everyone I know and don't know to become customers; especially if they have coffee or restaurant business's.
